name: Black Honey
description: This rum and Cynar cocktail comes in exotic and sweet, and leaves you dark and bitter.
recipeYield: makes 1 cocktail, enough syrup for about 10 cocktails
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce Smith & Cross Jamican Navy Strength Rum
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lime

recipeInstructions.text: For the syrup: in a small sauce pan over high heat, add water, honey, cinnamon and bring to a simmer, stirring to dissolve. Remove from heat, cover, and let stand for 30 minutes. Strain into an airtight container. Will keep for about one month refrigerated.
For the cocktail: fill a mixing glass 2/3 full with ice and add Cynar, rum, syrup, and lime juice. Stir for about 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail coupe.
